languages.text: {n}Идира пожимает плечами.{/n} "Я уже давно перестала верить в какое-либо после. Вас ждет протекторат и новые вершины, которые вы, несомненно, покорите. Меня..." {n}Голос женщины на секунду срывается, но она, шумно втянув воздух, берет себя в руки.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, пожалуйста, не заставляйте меня думать о том, что меня ждет".

{n}Idira shrugs.{/n} "I stopped believing in afters long ago. You've got your protectorate and new heights to conquer, which I'm sure you'll do in no time. And I've—" {n}Her voice cracks for a moment, but she inhales loudly and composes herself.{/n} "Lord Captain, please don't make me think about what's waiting for me."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира пожимает плечами.{/n} "Я уже давно перестала верить в какое-либо после. Вас ждет протекторат и новые вершины, которые вы, несомненно, покорите. Меня..." {n}Голос женщины на секунду срывается, но она, шумно втянув воздух, берет себя в руки.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, пожалуйста, не заставляйте меня думать о том, что меня ждет".

And I've—" {n}Her voice cracks for a moment, but she inhales loudly and recomposes herself.{/n} "Lord Captain, please don't make me think about the things I've got to look forward to."

{n}Idira shrugs.{/n} "I stopped believing in afters long ago. You've got your protectorate and new heights to conquer, which I'm sure you'll do in no time. And I've—" {n}Her voice cracks for a moment, but she inhales loudly and recomposes herself.{/n} "Lord Captain, please don't make me think about the things I've got to look forward to."

And I've—" {n}Her voice cracks for a moment, but she inhales loudly and composes herself.{/n} "Lord Captain, please don't make me think about what's waiting for me."

{n}Idira shrugs.{/n} "I stopped believing in afters long ago. You've got your protectorate and new heights to conquer, which I'm sure you'll do in no time. And I've—" {n}Her voice cracks for a moment, but she inhales loudly and composes herself.{/n} "Lord Captain, please don't make me think about what's waiting for me."

{n}Idira shrugs.{/n} "I stopped believing in afters long ago. You've got your protectorate and new heights to conquer, which I'm sure you'll do in no time. And I've—" {n}Her voice cracks for a moment, but she inhales loudly and composes herself.{/n} "Lord Captain, please don't make me think about what's waiting for me."

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉耸了耸肩。{/n}“像这样的事情，我很久以前就不再去想了。你还有你的王朝要打理，还有更多的领土要征服，我相信你一定能做得到。而我——”{n}她的声音变得有些嘶哑，但她大声吸了口气，强迫自己平静下来。{/n}“拜托了，舰长大人，别再让我去想我要面对的命运了吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shrugs.{/n} "I stopped believing in afters long ago. You've got your protectorate and new heights to conquer, which I'm sure you'll do in no time. And I've—" {n}Her voice cracks for a moment, but she inhales loudly and composes herself.{/n} "Lord Captain, please don't make me think about what's waiting for me."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉耸了耸肩。{/n}“像这样的事情，我很久以前就不再去想了。你还有你的王朝要打理，还有更多的领土要征服，我相信你一定能做得到。而我——”{n}她的声音变得有些嘶哑，但她大声吸了口气，强迫自己平静下来。{/n}“拜托了，舰长大人，别再让我去想我要面对的命运了吧。”

languages.text: {n}Idira zuckt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Ich glaube schon lange nicht mehr an ein Später. Ihr habt Euer Protektorat zu leiten und neue Höhen zu erklimmen, was Ihr auch gewiss in Windeseile tun werdet. Und ich -" {n}Ihre Stimme bricht kurz, doch sie atmet laut ein und fasst sich.{/n} "Lord Captain, bitte lasst mich nicht daran denken, was auf mich wartet."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shrugs.{/n} "I stopped believing in afters long ago. You've got your protectorate and new heights to conquer, which I'm sure you'll do in no time. And I've—" {n}Her voice cracks for a moment, but she inhales loudly and composes herself.{/n} "Lord Captain, please don't make me think about what's waiting for me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira zuckt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Ich glaube schon lange nicht mehr an ein Später. Ihr habt Euer Protektorat zu leiten und neue Höhen zu erklimmen, was Ihr auch gewiss in Windeseile tun werdet. Und ich -" {n}Ihre Stimme bricht kurz, doch sie atmet laut ein und fasst sich.{/n} "Lord Captain, bitte lasst mich nicht daran denken, was auf mich wartet."

languages.text: {n}Idira hausse les épaules.{/n} « Ça fait longtemps que je ne crois plus aux fins heureuses. Vous avez votre protectorat et de nouveaux sommets à conquérir, ce qui ne devrait pas être trop compliqué pour vous. Quant à moi... » {n}Elle s'interrompt un instant, puis prend une grande inspiration pour se ressaisir.{/n} « Je vous en prie, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, ne m'obligez pas à penser à ce qui m'attend. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shrugs.{/n} "I stopped believing in afters long ago. You've got your protectorate and new heights to conquer, which I'm sure you'll do in no time. And I've—" {n}Her voice cracks for a moment, but she inhales loudly and composes herself.{/n} "Lord Captain, please don't make me think about what's waiting for me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira hausse les épaules.{/n} « Ça fait longtemps que je ne crois plus aux fins heureuses. Vous avez votre protectorat et de nouveaux sommets à conquérir, ce qui ne devrait pas être trop compliqué pour vous. Quant à moi... » {n}Elle s'interrompt un instant, puis prend une grande inspiration pour se ressaisir.{/n} « Je vous en prie, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, ne m'obligez pas à penser à ce qui m'attend. »

languages.text: {n}Idira se encoge de hombros.{/n} «Dejé de creer en el futuro hace mucho tiempo. Tiene un protectorado del que cuidar y nuevas cotas que alcanzar. Y yo...». {n}Su voz se quiebra por un momento, pero pronto recupera la compostura y respira hondo.{/n} «Lord Capitán, le ruego que no me haga pensar en lo que me espera».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shrugs.{/n} "I stopped believing in afters long ago. You've got your protectorate and new heights to conquer, which I'm sure you'll do in no time. And I've—" {n}Her voice cracks for a moment, but she inhales loudly and composes herself.{/n} "Lord Captain, please don't make me think about what's waiting for me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira se encoge de hombros.{/n} «Dejé de creer en el futuro hace mucho tiempo. Tiene un protectorado del que cuidar y nuevas cotas que alcanzar. Y yo...». {n}Su voz se quiebra por un momento, pero pronto recupera la compostura y respira hondo.{/n} «Lord Capitán, le ruego que no me haga pensar en lo que me espera».

languages.text: {n}イディラは肩をすくめる。{/n}「あたいはとっくの昔に未来を信じるのはやめたわ。あなたには保護領があるし、征服すべき新たな高みもある。きっとそれもすぐに成し遂げるでしょう。そしてあたいは…」{n}彼女の声は一瞬かすれたが、大きく息を吸い込んで気を取り直した。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、あたいに未来のことを考えさせないようにしてちょうだい」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shrugs.{/n} "I stopped believing in afters long ago. You've got your protectorate and new heights to conquer, which I'm sure you'll do in no time. And I've—" {n}Her voice cracks for a moment, but she inhales loudly and composes herself.{/n} "Lord Captain, please don't make me think about what's waiting for me."

languages.text: {n}İdira omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Bir şeylerin sonrasına inanmayı uzun zaman önce bıraktım. Senin protektoran ve tırmanabileceğin yeni zirveler var. Eminim zaman içerisinde bunu başaracaksın da. Ben..." {n}Sesi bir anlığına titrese de derin bir nefes alıp kendini toparlıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, lütfen beni nelerin beklediğini düşünmeme sebep olma."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shrugs.{/n} "I stopped believing in afters long ago. You've got your protectorate and new heights to conquer, which I'm sure you'll do in no time. And I've—" {n}Her voice cracks for a moment, but she inhales loudly and composes herself.{/n} "Lord Captain, please don't make me think about what's waiting for me."
